div.h3: Reviews created for delgadod for sprint Gortahork 4
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-5111: Updated calendar day query to truncate the dates.
FAB-5113: Reinit the work calendar widget in the tabstrip when the user reaches the tab
FAB-5048: Updated calendar start and end dates and refresh the UI.
FAB-5510: Updated search for a specific date to look for it from in-memory objects.
FAB-5143: Clone the employment from original leave request to the associated when it is created.
FAB-5532: Added service method to retrieve active occupation from leave request.
FAB-5532: Validate active occupation after first step during add time process.
FAB-5533: Clone the active occupation at first step during add time process if any.
FAB-5071: Removed the work calendar below occupation details.
